meanings.definition: To live in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: She is residing in the small town near the mountains.
meanings.sent2: Many families are residing in the neighborhood for years.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to be residing comfortably on the warm blanket.
meanings.sent4: His memories of childhood are residing in the old house.
meanings.sent5: The idea of peace and tranquility is residing in the countryside.

meanings.definition: To be present as a permanent member or on a long-term basis.
meanings.sent1: The old tree has been residing in the garden for decades.
meanings.sent2: Several artists are residing in the art community for their entire careers.
meanings.sent3: The idea of happiness is residing in the simple moments of life.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed is residing deep within his heart.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of unity is residing in the hearts of the team members.
